page.title: 16Playground Games
page.content: The low walls in playground are used for a variety of games.The most popular boys'game is called "Sharks".The idea for it came from the film"Jaws".The pavement becomes the sea and one child patrols there pretending to be a shark.Sometimes one child is 'sacrificed' by the rest who throw him into the water.If caught you then become the shark. The girls'favourite is "Eggy Peggy"which involves standing in a line facing tha person who is on(A).A rhyme is chanted and then a subject chosen, for examle, colour.Unknown to (A) each child is given a colour. The child whose colour that is, has to hop to (A),who also hops.They try to knock each other off balance and the last one to put their foot down is on.
